snippet.title: Lead and Gold: Gangs of the Wild West Trapper Trailer
snippet.description:
Get the game here: http://store.steampowered.com/app/42100/

Pre-ordering the game gives you IMMEDIATE access to the beta.

In this trailer for Lead and Gold: Gangs of the Wild West you get to meet the Trapper. One of four unique professions in the game.

Lead and Gold: Gangs of the Wild West is a third person shooter delivering an intense team based multiplayer experience. Relive the violent era of the Wild West as it ought to be with adrenaline fuelled action and fast paced gunfights. Fight gritty battles in beautifully rendered classic western settings. Test your mettle in genre specific game modes and levels tailor-made for satisfying team play.

Lead and Gold features the unique Synergy system, a power up system encouraging co-operation and team tactics. The Synergy system permeates the frantic shooter gameplay and rewards the player for objective oriented gameplay.

Features * Four distinct playable characters with a multitude of strengths and weaknesses * A diverse level-up system letting you adapt your character to each game round as it unfolds * A multitude of different game modes and settings all with a distinct feeling of the old West will give the game a lot of replayability. * Lead and Gold Gangs of the Wild West will reward players that play as a team, through the synergy system. * Game modes and mechanics are designed to be easy to understand with a minimum of prerequisites.
